column4: he guys whenever i restart for the third time after installing ubuntu i get a GRUB error 13
is there a way to make it install LILO instead?
and without fail, the third time i boot i get a GRUB error 15
does this computer have a recovery software on the hard drive?
ok so there is no recovery partition good
last time it worked was when?
this is a first time install?
the first time ubuntu was installed on this system, it occured on the third boot
did you format the ENTIRE DISK?
sounds like your boot loader is choosing the wrong one then -- is it SERIAL ATA?
